bibl.title: The avis phoenix in the Schools of Rhetoric: P. Mil.Vogl. I 20 and P. Lond. Lit. 193 Revisited.
bibl.note: A preliminary and shorter version of this paper was delivered at the Dipartimento di Scienze dell'Antichità, Università degli Studi di Milano, on 26th October 2009. Offers a re-edition of the section on the phoenix in P. Mil. Vogl. I, 20 (= M.-P.3 1996; LDAB 4772) and P. lit. Lond. 193 (= M.-P.3 2524; LDAB 4730), with translation and commentary, followed by some final considerations on the treatment of the myth in the two compositions, and the (possible) use of the two texts in schools. - 1. Introduction. - 2. P. Mil. Vogl. I 20, col. I, 1-17. - 3. P. Lond. Lit. 193, fr. 2. - 4. General observations. - Avec résumé en anglais.
